content: **update 31 august 2010 ** there are now detailed instructions for row 1-8 of this pattern including photos on my blog here http //kaet wordpress com/2010/08/31/multiple-layer-crochet-flower-petals-in-detail-part-1/ part 2 http //kaet wordpress com/2010/09/01/multiple-layer-crochet-flower-petals- -in-detail- -part-2/ part 3 http //kaet wordpress com/2010/09/02/multiple-layer-crochet-flower-petals- -in-detail- -part-3/ so far the pattern given is more of a recipe let me know if more details are required this design is intended to make a baby blanket with good texture for little hands to play with but with no holes for little fingers to get caught in
